title: Spacious Garden Apartment in Great Evanston Location!
posting_body: ['See better photos and', 'SCHEDULE A SHOWING', 'at:', '<URL>', "No, it's not a hyperlink.", ' :-(  You still have to copy-and-paste this link into the address bar on your web browser.', 'Spacious Garden Apartment in Great Evanston Location!', '801 Monroe - G, Evanston, IL, 60202', 'Available September 15th', '1 bed, 1 full bath', 'Available mid-September!', 'Please email leasing with any showing requests or inquiries.', 'Spacious ground level apartment with generous room sizes!', 'Features:', '- Large bedroom', '- Large eat-in kitchen', '- Kitchen pantry', '- Lots of natural light', '- Laundry on site', '- Pet friendly (cats and small dogs up to 40lbs, breed restrictions, pet fee)', '- Responsive maintenance staff', '- Close to El and Metra stations', 'Terms:', '$400 Non-Refundable Move In Fee', 'No Security Deposit', 'Flat rate $30/mo (Includes: Heat, Water, Sewer & Trash)', 'General Credit and Income Requirements:', '- 650+ credit score', '- Gross monthly income should be at least 3x the rent', '(There are some exceptions to these requirements, such as being a full time student and having a cosigner, or being an international student)', "Don't miss this!", 'Meltzer Real Estate', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'No Smoking', 'Rooms and Interior', '.', 'Garden apartment', 'Utilities and Extras', '.', 'Street parking', '.', 'Laundry on-site', 'Lease Terms', '.', 'One year lease', '.', 'No smoking building', '.', 'Dogs ok up to 40 lbs', '.', 'Cats ok', 'Contact Us:', 'Meltzer Real Estate LLC', 'Sarah Carter', '773.800.1135', 'See better photos and', 'SCHEDULE A SHOWING', 'at:', '<URL>']
